casebody.data:
No. 10-708. First American Financial Corporation, Successor in Interest to The First American Corporation, et al., Petitioners v. Denise P. Edwards. 562 U.S. 1255, 131 S. Ct. 1592,

179 L. Ed. 2d 472,

2011 U.S. LEXIS 1865. February 28, 2011.

The Acting Solicitor General is invited to file a brief in this case expressing the views of the United States.
